title: Life Is So Long - Novel Updates
tags: Coming of Age   Death   Love at First Sight   Oneshot
author: Tian Tang Fang Zhu Zhe   天堂放逐者
description:
Life is so long, you never know what to expect next.

—in other words: your ending is already decided.

Cui Ying is 18 years old, but doesn’t know why she likes her English teacher so much, or why she fell in love with that boy at first sight.>
